title: [幫推] 召集國際/本地知名院校學生，係時候到你地幫手！！

replies.msg:
聯署連結
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeWIbQdSlLce-LB2kYyfAA3eCZA-0elzgBomyQaKhSbwFIp-Q/viewform

如擔心安全問題，可login由Admin 開的Gmail account 方便大家聯署。
Login : idcardsubmission@gmail.com
PW : submityourid

致各海外大學留學生，

就算身不在港，我們一眾心繫香港的留學生仍想為香港出一分力，希望於此亂世為公義發聲。一眾留學生儘管飲水思源，欲以知識貢獻社會；但目前港府施政使人才流失，我們只能避走他鄉，未能回流一展抱負。須知前人種樹，後人乘涼。上一代盡心盡力供書教學，寄予厚望及栽培，望我們能貢獻社會。但眼見目前港府是非黑白不分，令人民生活艱苦，我們有義務回饋社會，向不公義說不。

請邀請你認識的海外朋友一同參與。五大訴求，缺一不可。

一眾心繫香港的海外大學留學生
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Push] Calling all international and local well-known university students, it's now your turn to show up!

Link to submit your support:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeWIbQdSlLce-LB2kYyfAA3eCZA-0elzgBomyQaKhSbwFIp-Q/viewform

For those who are concerned about safety, you can use this burner Gmail account that we created for submission.

Login : idcardsubmission@gmail.com
PW : submityourid


To all fellow overseas university students from Hong Kong,

Even though we are not physically in Hong Kong, we, students who are studying abroad but are emotionally tied to Hong Kong, are still desperate to commit, to speak for justice during these turbulent days. However, although many of us wish to contribute to our society with our acquired knowledge, the governance of the Hong Kong government has led to the loss of talent. We have no choice but to flee to other places, failing to return to fulfill our ambitions. April showers bring May flowers. Our previous generation dedicated their efforts to cultivating us, they place high hopes that we could contribute to society. Yet, witnessing the current Hong Kong government confounding black and white and right and wrong, daily living becomes strenuous and arduous. We have the obligation to pay back to the community and say no to injustice.
Please invite your overseas friends to participate. The five major UNRESPONDED appeals are indispensable.

A group of Hong Kong universities students studying abroad

replies.msg: 不要說「推」，試着説「8月5號齊罷工」
